title: Bloody Tuesday
description: Bradley West is back and he’s back with a vengeance! After narrowly escaping the sunny island of Key West with his very life, Bradley has moved on to New Orleans and to what he hoped would be a better life and brighter horizon. It didn’t take long for the infamous city of Night Clubs, Fine restaurants and debauchery to send its crazy karma out to find him. This ultra-bizarre saga has all the ingredients for a Great American Novel. The stolen monster reptile, two radically violent and warring factions of the Cajun mafia families and an abused and randomly bloodthirsty, murderous and psychopathic serial killer who takes orders from an imaginary God that exist only in his mind. Bloody Tuesday, an epic and terrifying thriller that will place you on a wicked rollercoaster ride that will surely leave you wanting more!
author: Joe Nolfo
